original_text: The sons of Naphtali according to their clans: of Jahzeel, the clan of the Jahzeelites; of Guni, the clan of the Gunites;
korean_text: 납달리 자손은 그들의 종족대로 이러하니 야셀에게서 난 야셀 종족과 구니에게서 난 구니 종족과

sentences.original_text: The sons of Naphtali according to their clans:
of Jahzeel, the clan of the Jahzeelites;
of Guni, the clan of the Gunites;
